global.invalidResponseExplanation: The node returned an invalid response.
global.invalidResponsePollingExplanation: The node returned an invalid response while polling.
global.notAvailableExplanation: It will be added at a later stage.
global.unrecognisedPasswordExplanation: Le mot de passe est incorrect. Veuillez réessayer.

addAdditionalSeed.seedInvalidChars: La Seed contient des caractères invalides
addAdditionalSeed.seedInvalidCharsExplanation: Seeds can only consist of the capital letters A-Z and the number 9. Your seed has invalid characters. Please try again.
addAdditionalSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Seeds must be {{maxLength}} characters long. Your seed is currently {{currentLength}} characters long. Please try again.

addAdditionalSeed.noNicknameExplanation: Please enter an account name for your seed.

changePassword.oopsExplanation: Looks like something went wrong while updating your password. Please try again.
changePassword.passwordUpdated: Mot de passe mis à jour
changePassword.passwordUpdatedExplanation: Votre mot de passe a été modifié avec succès.
changePassword.incorrectPasswordExplanation: Mot de passe incorrect. Veuillez réessayer.
changePassword.passwordsDoNotMatch: Les mots de passe ne correspondent pas

changePassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: Votre mot de passe doit contenir au moins 12 caractères. Veuillez réessayer.
changePassword.oldPasswordExplanation: You cannot use the old password as your new password. Please try again with a new password.
changePassword.ensureStrongPassword: Veillez à utiliser un mot de passe fort d'au moins 12 caractères.
changePassword.confirmPassword: Confirmer le Nouveau Mot de passe

copyToClipboard.seedClearedExplanation: La seed a été effacée du presse-papier pour plus de sécurité.
copyToClipboard.seedCopiedExplanation: The seed has been copied to the clipboard and will be cleared once you press "DONE" or 60 seconds have passed, whichever comes first.
copyToClipboard.clickToCopy: Click the button below and copy your seed to a password manager.

enterSeed.invalidCharactersExplanation: Seeds can only consist of the capital letters A-Z and the number 9. Your seed has invalid characters. Please try again.
enterSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Seeds must be {{maxLength}} characters long. Your seed is currently {{currentLength}} characters long. Please try again.
enterSeed.seedExplanation: Seeds should be {{maxLength}} characters long, and should contain capital letters A-Z, or the number 9. You cannot use seeds longer than {{maxLength}} characters.

login.emptyPasswordExplanation: Un mot de passe est requis pour la connexion. Veuillez réessayer.

loading.loadingFirstTime: Loading seed for the first time.

seedReentry.ifYouHaveNotSaved: If you have not saved your seed, please go back to the previous screen and do so.

send.invalidAddressExplanation1: Address should be 81 characters long and should have a checksum.
